topic: How to refactor ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to refactor ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Refactoring ETL Jobs Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to refactor Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) jobs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+ for more efficient and scalable data pipelines.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs.
It allows for easy integration with ETL processes due to its flexibility and speed.
Python 3.12+ offers several enhancements that improve performance and efficiency in ETL jobs.
The refactored ETL process will result in a more maintainable, scalable data pipeline.
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide due to its performance improvements.
FastAPI version 0.65.2 is used in these examples.
caveats: Ensure you have the necessary libraries installed, such as FastAPI and SQLAlchemy.
Adjust the code examples according to your specific ETL needs and data sources.
